job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pDo you want a meaningful job RadioMobile is looking for a Software Engineer to join the development team to create enhance maintain and develop 911 dispatch mobile and associated hardware used by public safety agencies and fleet management organizations Join the RadioMobile team developing exciting mission critical endtoend public safety systems including mobile hardware firmware and software This position concerns Windowsbased mobile data computers remote display terminals along with fire station alerting systems that include computers radios and station control units RadioMobile hosts onprem as well as cloudbased services Windows and iOS applications integration with various wireless communications including 4G5G 2way satellite and LMR All of this to make citizens and fire fighters safer and saving livesppbrppRadioMobiles development team is looking for a Software engineer with emphasis in strongMicrosoft Server SQL Server and Azurestrong environments to create enhance maintain and test software applications for 911 dispatch mobile devices and associated applications used by public safety departments amp fleet management organizations In addition to the current products this position will work with management and other team members to evaluate and create new programs and systems as part of ongoing innovationnbspppbrppstrongPOSITION REQUIREMENTSstrongpulliDesign amp development of software applications amp tools using standard development tools using Agile methodologyliliDesign amp development of database driven clientserver applicationsliliAssist team with QA testing problem resolution and documentationliliCoordinate with other staff designers and developers to ensure total endtoend system functionalityliliAssist with customer support enhancements and new featuresliulpbrppstrongREQUIRED QUALIFICATIONSstrongpulliBachelor or Masters degree of Computer Science or Computer Engineeringlili2 years directly related experience in Software Development technologiesliliExtensive development experience in C amp NET technologiesliliExtensive development experience using Microsoft SQL ServerliliDevelopment experience with REST APInbspliliStrong coding amp code review skillsliliProficient with GUI Graphical User Interface development tools and techniquesliliFamiliar with web development RadioMobile provides products that enable public safety and commercial organizations to have access to situational awareness information to make informed decisions With a wide portfolio ranging from ruggedized invehicle mobile data computers dispatchtracking software products including mapping fire station alerting mobile vehicle location services customized mobile data networking products
